data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Pollux (Acari: Erythraeidae) and redescription of P. kovalamicus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saboori, Alireza, Taemoori, Gholam Husein, Hakimitabar, Masoud (2016): Revision of the genus Pollux (Acari: Erythraeidae) and redescription of P. kovalamicus. Zootaxa 4117 (1): 115-124, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4117.1.6
